wikipedia_page.main: Paul Anthony Wilson (born 2 August 1968 in Bradford) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder for Huddersfield Town, Northampton Town, Halifax Town, Burnley, York City, Scunthorpe United and Cambridge United.
